section.name: Configuring Jetspeed-2 Security
section.p:
An overview of Jetspeed-2 security architecture is available
here
.

subsection.name: Guide to Authentication Configuration
subsection.p:
Jetspeed-2 provides a
LoginModule implementation
that leverage the security SPI model to interact with multiple authentication mechanisms.

Jetspeed authentication configuration is managed by the security-spi-atn.xml located in the portal application assembly directory. Jetspeed-2 supports authentication against:
A relational database (default authentication implementation).
A LDAP authentication implementation.

subsection.name: Guide to Authorization Configuration
subsection.p: Jetspeed-2 provides a relational database backed JAAS policy implementation.
Jetspeed-2 authorization implementation relies on a SPI model as well and is configured through security-spi-atz.xml. Configuration details are available here.
